description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: sum by(method, status, uri, action) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*(actuator|cloudfoundryapplication).*"}[5m])) / sum by(method, status, uri, action) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*(actuator|cloudfoundryapplication).*"}[5m]))

title: Demo
